Author: blackberry_pie
Title: 🚀[ANN][ICO] Altair VR. Next-gen Blockchain VR Wikipedia
Body: Hello! It's written in WP. Information about the content created on the platform will be stored in the blockchain, so payments to authors will be made in a transparent and understandable manner. Each request is processed by a trusted platform node. User IDs with information about the application are written in the blockchain system. Simultaneously, the node checks the user's balance and receives application boot files from the virtual data store. If the necessary conditions are met, the node sends boot files to the user, and the cost of the application is debited from the account. The full transaction is thus carried out by the node. A smart contract determines the remuneration of all participants in the process and information about the transaction will be recorded in the blockchain.

Title: 🚀[ANN][ICO] Altair VR. Next-gen Blockchain VR Wikipedia
Body: We have an update about "burning" of tokens: Unsold tokens will NOT be released. Tokens are generated upon the receipt of a crypto currency on a smart contract, and transferred to the initiator of transaction. Use tokens will be possible immediately after the completion of ITO, until then they are frozen. The emission of tokens for sale is limited to an upper limit of 50 million units. Upon completion of ITO, smart contract produces similar number of tokens sold (the second 50%) and distributes them into three pools: investor, team, advisors, with a freeze for 1 year until March 15, 2018, platform fund, and bounty (with a freeze to 30 April). Thus unsold tokens are simply not produced, so there is nothing to burn. It's easier and more reliable.

Author: altbar
Title: 🚀[ANN][ICO] Altair VR. Next-gen Blockchain VR Wikipedia
Body: Dear bitcointalk community, Altair Digital team glad to announce Altair VR ICO. Please feel free for any further questions.    ALTAIR VR NEXT-GEN BLOCKCHAIN WIKIPEDIA   You’ll remember forever what you’ve experienced yourself!   WEBSITE | WHITEPAPER | BOUNTY | TWITTER | FACEBOOK | TELEGRAM | BLOG | YOUTUBE         INTRODUCING NEXT-GEN WIKIPEDIA  We are creating a new VR Encyclopedia that allows users to discover the world. Our platform allows community members to create and distribute VR experiences (applications). It’s a perfect tool for those who are looking for affordable, easy-to-use learning experiences that employ senses and emotions. Our target users are audiences of the National Geographic and Discovery Channels.  •  We are creating a global VR platform that allows users to discover the world. It’s community-run and blockchain-based. •  It’s a decentralized virtual encyclopedia. It allows users to learn more about the world either in game or academic format. From molecules to the edge of the Universe; dinosaurs, to scenarios of the future. •  The content is to be created by users and financed by a platform’s in-built trust fund, as well as by crowdfunding. •  The platform can be accessed via a browser from any VR device. It aims to avoid prohibitively high fees traditionally charged by VR stores, as well as censorship.     WHAT IS ALTAIR VR?  We have been working in the field of additional education for over 7 years. During this time, we managed to build in Russia and the CIS the largest network of mobile planetariums thereby introducing astronomy to more than 500,000 children.   The next stage is the creation of a platform to virtually discover the world through teaching and interactive games – a type of Virtual Encyclopedia for the natural sciences including, but not limited to: chemistry, physics, biology, natural science, geography, and history.  We have created a VR encyclopedia in which anyone can create their own content and share their interpretation of knowledge. Content on the site will be generated according to the users’ preferences and selected through a voting process.      ALTAIR VR ENCYCLOPEDIA ADVANTAGES  •  Use your time to learn new things •  Educational content presented as a game •  Wikipedia-style (tags) navigation between experiences •  Neural network-based guide suggesting new experiences •  Tours of the virtual world •  Content that can be integrated into school curriculum and classes      WHY BLOCKCHAIN?  •  Transparency of all payments within the platform and low fees •  Full control over copyright and content authors’ fees •  Decentralised data storage on the blockchain guarantees independence and stability •  Community can manage content creation using a transparent voting system •  Tender-based content creation process regulated by smart contracts •  Purchase of tokens upon registration on the platform      WHO WE ARE   ROADMAP  •  [JANUARY, 2017] Launch of the world's first Spherical Cinema in VR •  [APRIL, 2017] Launch of the VR Planetarium franchise •  [AUGUST, 2017] 1st place in the world rating of VR applications •  [OCTOBER, 2017] 15 sold franchises. Launch of international sales •  [APRIL, 2018] Launch of the base platform •  [JUNE, 2018] We add axes of scale, time and space •  [SEPTEMBER, 2018] Virtual Guru •  [NOVEMBER, 2018] Voting and tenders •  [JANUARY, 2019] Crowdfunding •  [MARCH, 2019] We create excursions and lessons •  [JUNE, 2019] API for external studios      TOKEN STRUCTURE  •  Token name - ALVR Token •  Token standard - ERC20 •  Ethereum Blockchain platform •  ALVR tokens is total amount of issued tokens •  1% of daily used tokens get burned, until just 10% of the original emission remain •  There will be no subsequent token emission •  ALVR tokens will be used in all these transactions •  The bounty pool will be unfrozen and available for sale one-and-a-half months after the end of the ICO •  Team tokens will be frozen for a one year      AVR TOKEN USE  A great number of small transactions will be performed within the Altair VR platform on a daily basis, including transactions between app users, content writers and developers, moderators, and franchise holders. AVR tokens will be used in all these transactions.  •  The ALVR token as an access key to apps •  The ALVR token as an internal means of payment •  You can use ALVR tokens to buy offline franchises •  The ALVR token as access to the voting system •  Help us improve our platform and earn more tokens •  We will finance new content creation with ALVR tokens      OUR TEAM      ACCELERATORS AND FUNDS THAT ARE ALREADY SUPPORT US       MORE DETAIL INFORMATION AVAILABLE ON WEBSITE    Join our telegram chat   CROWDSALE STAGES 1) Private Pre-Sale  2) Pre-ITO. From May 21, 2018 till June 3  3) ITO. From June 15, till August 31. (approx)
